content.description:
TWISTED SISTER 5.11d **** (85') M (6b)

A fantastic climb winding up the steep face right of "Castor". Start at the big corner until it's possible to traverse left to the "castor" crack. Climb the face right of the crack, traversing right to the upper face. Cruxes all over the place, good pro and rests, interesting technical moves.
content.protection: Mixed, 6 bolts plus an assortment of gear.
content.location: The first route left of the huge upper inside corner.

content.description:
TUMMO PRACTICE

5.10b ** (70') M (6b)

A good warm up at the right side of the middle ledge. Begin 15' left of the fir tree; climb the lower cracks and face to the ledge, then climb the upper face diagonally to the chain anchors.
content.protection: Mixed - 6bolts and take medium to small gear for the first and last placements.
content.location: right end of the middle ledge

content.description:
SIDE SHOW 5.11a * (85') TR (1b)

Start 5' left of "Little Feat" and climb the left side of the face to the single bolt and cold shut anchors

POLLUX 5.11b/A0 ** (85') M (4b)

The left of the pair of cracks on the east face. Start as for "castor" but continue around left into the left facing corner. Pull on two bolts up high to gain the upper left side, crux above.....
content.location: At the far south end of the east face

content.description:
OUT OF TIME 5.9 * (50') M (4b)

The short face at the right end of the northern lower tier below the pine tree. Climb the diagonal crack to the face. Anchor at the small pine tree with the single cold shut beside it.
content.location: Far right end of the lower face

content.description:
LOST HORIZON 5.10c ** (75') F (8b)

Climbs the face and arete on the right side of the south face to the cold shut anchors. Great!

LITTLE FEAT 5.11a *** (80') M (5b)

The middle of the longer east face (right of the long roof). Follow the bolts and intermittent cracks to the cold shuts on top. Very nice face climbing
content.protection: Mixed - 5 bolts, take a few medium cams and nuts.
content.location: Middle of the middle east face

content.description:
DEJA VU 5.11a (60') F (5b)

The route on the far left end of the northern lower tier. Climb the slabby face to the left set of cold shuts. Excellent climbing with some surprises.
content.location: left end of the lower northern tier

content.description:
CASTOR 5.11+ ? * (80') G/TR

The right crack on the east facing wall at the far south end of the cliff.
content.location: Left of the main huge corner.
